comments: The highest power of 2 dividing a(n) appears to be A011371(n). The odd part starts 1, 1, 23, 139, 6977, 237767, 23274871, 372518119, 61258085177,.... - _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 14 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n)={n*=2; my(x='x+O('x^(n+1))); polcoeff( serlaplace( -tan(log(cos(x)))), n); } \\ _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 14 2013
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Checked by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 16 2011
